gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: DONLON Area 1 obstacle data set sample (Full initial data set) in AIXM 5.1 format. Data collection and publication fully compliant with ICAO Annex 15 (16th Edition, July 2018) requirements and AIXM 5.1. coding guidelines (aixm.aero/confluence). Horizontal and Vertical Confidence Level for all data is 90%.
